sections_found: Regulated Industry Expertise Perfectly Aligned with InsurTech

bullet_1.text: **React**: 8+ years across multiple companies (CrossLend, Market Logic, Panorama Berlin, Oetker Digital) through current React 19 with Astro 5.12+ implementation

bullet_2.text: **TypeScript**: 6+ years from Oetker Digital through current development projects including [personal website](https://colemorton.com)

bullet_3.text: **Node.js**: 2+ years backend development including API services and GraphQL implementations

bullet_4.text: **GraphQL**: Direct experience at Oetker Digital and Panorama Berlin implementing Apollo GraphQL with Node.js backends
bullet_4.note: Expanded from library with specific company examples

bullet_1.text: **FinTech Platform Leadership**: CrossLend - Maintained platform stability and regulatory compliance throughout scaling from 3 to 20+ developers

bullet_2.text: **Healthcare Enterprise Systems**: CharmHealth - Built oncology and patient management system for Chris O'Brien Lifehouse where strict regulatory compliance was core to all business logic

bullet_3.text: **Financial API Integration**: 20+ financial APIs integrated in [Sensylate](https://github.com/ColeMorton/sensylate) platform, demonstrating complex system integration capabilities

bullet_1.text: Earlier this year, my wife and I relocated to Brisbane to start our new life and put down roots, with close family connections here.

bullet_2.text: As a New Zealand citizen, I have full Australian work rights without visa complications.
